column1: tell you everything thats going on theres a little girl her brother for a he is on a s step on a high reaching up and the stool is going out from under him he is going to fall the mother is washing and not paying attention the sink the water in the sink is overflowing she doesnt seem to be aware of it the through the window we can see a walkway then a grassy theres two two and a plate on a kitchen counter the jar is full and the boy the lid off and one in his hand thats it
